Title: Daksh Dave | Personal Webpage
Name: Daksh Dave
Description: An Entrepreneur by the heart and a developer by the mind. I have over 2.5 years of (part-time+full-time) experience in system design and development in some successful product startups and MNCs.

I have built enterprise software as well as scalable consumer products end to end. I have identified various critical performance bottlenecks in the system, fixed them in some cases, and re-wrote the feature from the ground up in others. Have been part of various mission-critical events. Have handled 'do or die' moments of crisis and brought the system back to life. I Have implemented complex data-driven Algorithms and data pipelines.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn, create and play..!
Go, Ruby, Java, Rails, Grails, Django, Python, C++, Springboot
AboutContent: I design systems. I love whiteboards. I love building things, from understanding requirements to drawing on whiteboards to prototyping, building it for scale, and deploying. My main strengths lie in the vast pieces of knowledge that I have garnered by working across various sectors and verticals in Research, Core Electronics, Finance and Technology, Recommendation Platforms, Enterprise Software(SAAS Platforms), IT Services, Social media platforms, and Consumer Products. I have worked across various domains. I do not carry any particular affection for any domain. As long as there exists a problem worth solving, the domain and sector are just a name I believe. And if the problem's interesting enough then there's no looking back.
I’m an Electrical Electronics passout from BITS PIlani. A developer by day, a Calisthenics Enthusisast by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m , off to a hike, Working out, or studying for an exam/interview/ Just for the sake of Learning :p
I am passionate about Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk(Correction:Was).
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: Currently, I am working with Wells Fargo to build and scale its Trading Analytics platform that caters to US Traders and other financial institutions. I am open to explore and collaborate to solve challenging and interesting real-world problems.
ProjectsStartLine: Some of the side projects I did can be found here :

Publications.name: Learning Analytics and Online Courses: A Bayesian Belief Network Approach to Predict Success

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
